text:
congrats on the new role! im actually a lawyer turned marketer, so interesting to see this question posed!

my suggestion would be in a small team, be flexible enough and no need to set such defined roles. as long as it is clear what each role should deliver / ship, let them work some parts of it out. some things (like content creation v seo ) arent quite clear cut and you cant always separate it.

lmk if that doesnt make sense and happy to chat more on this!
